name: Nell & the Festival of Spooks
description:
✦STORY✦

Nell is an ordinary girl with a love for horror. 

Unfortunately, she lives in the boring suburbs where nothing happens. Her luck changes when an eclipse transports her to a spooky town where she gets enrolled into a fancy academy.  

Will she be able to prepare for the school festival in time and put on a show that will blow everyone away?

Help Nell and her friends discover their true passions and build friendships along the way.

✦ABOUT✦

- A Slice-of-Life visual novel

- Short & sweet story, ~50 mins long

- Meet 9 uniquely designed characters

- One (happy) ending!! 

- For $5, get a Digital Art Pack that includes:  PDF Art book  of in-game art + Backgrounds for your desktop & phone!

- More illustrations will probably be added later on as I make them!

✦CREDITS✦

 Game by Becky Wu

Follow me here: instagram | twitter | ko-fi

Mall Backgrounds by Eunice Lai

Music:

'HalloweenerDog' by Oli.Vyae

           A Watermelon Snack' and 'Sunset Shadows' by Louie Zong
